args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: High Voltage Batteries May Short Circuit

Gillig, LLC (Gillig) is recalling certain 2023-2024 Low Floor transit buses.  The high voltage batteries may have loose hardware that can fall inside the battery pack and create a short circuit.A short circuit increases the risk of a fire.  In addition, the battery contactors may open suddenly and cause a loss of drive power, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 15.0
